scripts.deploy: npm run build & rmdir /Q /S -r "C:\Users\Jelte Boelens\Documents\react\scheduler\build" & xcopy /E /I "C:\Users\Jelte Boelens\Documents\react\scheduler_front_end\build" "C:\Users\Jelte Boelens\Documents\react\scheduler\build" & cd "C:\Users\Jelte Boelens\Documents\react\scheduler"  & git add . & git commit -m "deply commit" && git push heroku master
scripts.deploy_test: npm run build & rmdir /Q /S -r "..\back_end\build" & xcopy /E /I build "..\back_end\build" & cd "..\back_end" & git add . & git commit & git push heroku master
